title: Recruiting Ranked 5 Team members for Serious Play!
body:
Hey guys,

I have decided on starting up my own ranked team, as I have had many previous experiences with ranked teams and want to start getting serious in the ranked 5's side of the game. I am 17 years of age and am currently Gold 5 and have been in approximately 4, ranked 5 teams. I have great knowledge in the area of teams and working together to achieve the goal of victory. As I am taking this seriously, I will be having schedules in which games are going to be played, practice sessions, and general team meetings which will be occurring every week when possible. I will be wanting the members of the team to be able to play at least 10 games per week. So the team will be consisting of Gold 1 onwards. Not accepting anyone below that as this is a serious ranked team.

To show that you are interested and would be willing and dedicated to join the team, I'd happily ask if you'd fill out a short application and I will get back to you as quickly as possible.

IGN:
Age:
Main Role:
Favourite Champion:
Rank:
Curse or Skype:
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day:
What hours suit you best to play:
A bit about yourself and league experience:

Once I have accepted your application, I will notify you from in game and go from there!

Thanks, Sir Jazza

replies.body:
IGN:Wildfire Zyra
Age:28
Main Role:sup
Favourite Champion:thresh,leo,sona
Rank:gold 4
Curse or Skype: team speak? skype
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day:3-6
What hours suit you best to play:5-12pm nz time
A bit about yourself and league experience: love lol just need the right team:)

IGN: Tung
Age: 19
Main Role: Mid / Top / Jg
Favourite Champion: Ahri, Fizz, Yasuo (changes over time, can play anything)
Rank: D4
Curse or Skype: Skype
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: Few hours
What hours suit you best to play: Weekdays (6 onwards), Weekends (anytime)
A bit about yourself and league experience:
- Studying commerce at uni
- Played other games like FFXIV, GW2, CS:GO and random single player games
- Played since S1
- Played in a few ranked teams, but mainly just consisted of friends with varied skill levels
- Always playing to improve mechanically and strategically

IGN: Scrawny Unicorn 
Age: 20
Main Role: adc
Favourite Champion: vayne, gaves and corki
Rank: plat 4
Curse or Skype: Skype
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: as much as I can
What hours suit you best to play: 4-12 pm nz time
A bit about yourself and league experience: Been playing since season 2 and improving each season, but I've never played ranked 5s before but being someone who plays a lot of team sports working with a team shouldn't be a problem. I am a quiet person at first so give me time  :)

IGN; Spaghini
Age; 18
Main role: Top lane
Favourite champion: Riven
Rank: Platinum 4
Curse or Skype: Have both along with  teamspeak
Length of time I can dedicate to team: From about 7-10pm each night at least, potentially longer
What hours suit: Weeknights, any time weekends
A bit about myself: Playing mainly carry toplaners (riven/fizz/rumble) but happy to play tanks/anyone in flavour for 5s 
(e.g. maokai, olaf, hecarim, shen). Watch a lot of pro scene, already play in a semi-serious 5s team but looking
for something more serious.

IGN: Mattsherona
Age: 18
Main Role: Jungle
Favourite Champion: Master Yi
Rank: Diamond 5
Curse or Skype: Have Skype, happy to give if im on team.
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: Not sure about team, but I usually play 3-4 hrs of league a day
What hours suit you best to play: Weekdays --> NIghts, Weekends --> Day&Night
A bit about yourself and league experience: I main junglers that can carry currently (i.e. master yi, xin). However, seeing many pro games, once at a higher elo, im happy to learn others more suited to cc and helping midlaners / botlaners get fed.
http://plays.tv/u/Mattsherona
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=mattsherona
Links to some plays I've made in the past week (since I realised my gpu can record) and match history

IGN: Xuzhinhen
Age: 21
Main Role: ADC
Favourite Champion: Twitch
Rank: Plat V
Curse or Skype: both but pref curse
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day: 16 hours
What hours suit you best to play: 10am - 4am
A bit about yourself and league experience: Been playing league for 3 years, looking to get into the professional scene
